text: The 2019 Dresden heist occurred in the Grünes Gewölbe (Green Vault) museum in Dresden, Saxony, Germany, on 25 November 2019. Three out of ten sets of jewelry were stolen. The stolen items include diamond-laden breast star of the Polish Order of the White Eagle, a hat clasp with a 16-carat diamond, a diamond epaulet and a diamond-studded hilt containing nine large and 770 smaller diamonds, along with a matching scabbard. It is the largest such theft since World War II. ==References== Category:2019 crimes in Europe Category:2010s crimes in Germany Category:Burglary 2019 heist Category:November 2019 events Category:2019 in Germany
title: 2019 Dresden heist
